  • Defined in lib/api.ts:74

Hook to inject logic after server responds

param

API method response after it is sent out

param

true if API method exited with an error

param

IApiMountBeforeExecution

IApiMountBeforeExecution: (method: string, implementation: IApiMountApiHandler, context: IApiMountApi, req: Request, res: Response) => boolean
  • Defined in lib/api.ts:45

Hook to inject code before API execution

param

implementation of called method

param

context of this for called method implementation

IApiMountBeforeResponse

IApiMountBeforeResponse: (response: any, error: boolean, method: string, req: Request, res: Response) => boolean
  • Defined in lib/api.ts:60

param

param

returns

Const DEFAULT_NAME

DEFAULT_NAME: string = `${DEFAULT_NAME_PREFIX}${DEFAULT_PORT.toString()}`
  • Defined in lib/api.ts:21

Default express app name In theory there can be multiple but this is rarely needed

Const DEFAULT_NAME_PREFIX

DEFAULT_NAME_PREFIX: "default_" = "default_"
  • Defined in lib/api.ts:15

Default express app name prefix If multiple apps are launched on different ports, by default this prefix will be used
